{{Infobox Berry |name = #62 Salac |image = [[File:Salac.png]] |caption = This Berry is surrounded by mystery. It is rumored to be imbued with the power of the sky. |growtime = 2d 0h 0m 0s |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 10,000 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *30 sweet *10 bitter *30 sour }} '''Salac''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 ripe [[Coba]] on the field. Pokemon #384 Rayquaza must have been caught to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-6 Hours || 6-12 Hours || 12-24 Hours || 1-2 days || 2-4 days |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:SalacTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:SalacTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:SalacTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Salac berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Coba]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Coba]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Coba]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Coba]] |- | [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] |- | [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] |- | || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] || [[Coba]] |}
